attributes.action: CALLING ALL YOU MUMS, DADS, GRANDPARENTS, GAUDIANS
attributes.additional_details: HAD ENOUGH OF NOT LETTING YOUR CHILD OUT OF YOUR SITE? I HAVE! HAD ENOUGH OF HEARING THAT YET ANOTHER PAEDOPHILE HAS BEEN RELEASED FROM PRISON AFTER THEIR LAST SEXUAL OFFENCE AGAINST A CHILD TO COMMIT YET ANOTHER SICKENING CRIME? ARE YOU SHOCKED BY STORIES OF NURSERY WORKERS ABUSING OUR CHILDREN? ENOUGH IS ENOUGH. COME ON MUMS AND DAD'S LETS FIGHT BACK. GET ALL YOUR FRIENDS TO SIGN THIS PETITION. THIS IS WHAT WE DEMAND - ALL PERSONS FOUND GUILTY OF SEXUAL ABUSE TO A MINOR BE JAILED FOR LIFE NEVER TO BE RELEASED INTO SOCIETY AGAIN - SURELY THIS WOULD DETER THOSE CONTEMPLATING IT. THESE SICK INDIVIDUALS ARE LAUGHING AT THE LAW AND AT ALL OF US. THEY KNOW THAT WE ARE SO USE TO HEARING OF THESE CRIMES AGAINST OUR CHILDREN THAT WE HAVE BECOME TOLERANT OF THESE EVIL CRIMES. FOR GODS SAKE IS IT NOT ABOUT TIME WE FOUGHT BACK AND PROTECTED OUR LOVELY CHILDREN?
